What are the 5 Best Lipstick Shades to Try in Summers!

Give a girl the right lipstick and she can rule the world is the perfect saying for almost every woman alive on earth. Lip shades are a die-hard favourite make-up, not only does it make you look good but also instantly puts you in the right, confident frame of mind. In summers particularly, lipsticks are like your best friend, a real saviour to instantly brighten up your otherwise dull, oily face. Even when on those days full of heat and humidity, your sweaty skin practically puts you off make-up, lipsticks are often the only go-to solution to bring in some pop of colour to your face.

Although lipstick colours are usually selected as per the respective skin tones of every woman, the shades also vary a lot, depending on the season or time of the day. While the darker and brighter shades go well during the night or winter season, the summers and daytime both call for more subtle ones to complement as well as balance the mood. And this suits us girls all fine because when are the number of lipsticks we own ever enough; same goes for a glam and shiny lip gloss too.

So, here we have compiled the 5 must-have lip shades that sit perfectly well for the summers for all you girls to include in your make-up box.

1. Berrylicious- Purplish berry lips in dark or light tints are simply refreshing to sport on any summer day or winter for that matter. The shade is bold and beautiful and gives you that edge to have a lovely, flowery face, even with minimal or no make-up on. Get your hands on the Profusion Cosmetics Mixed Metals Lips- Berry now.

2. The Coral Shine- Coral is the perfect perky shade that is neither too bright nor too dull and goes just about right with so many of those summer dresses. It perfectly complements the summer vibe and whats more, there is a coral match for almost everyone out there. Check out for the different coral shades from lighter ones to bright peppy tones and pick one for your mood. The Faces Canada Weightless Matte Finish Lipstick Coral Magic 27 can be a great choice for a day out in the sun.

3. Lovely Pinks- Pink is after all the one colour that every girl relates to in some way or the other. If you are not too experimental and wish to play safe when it comes to your lip colour, a dewy shade of pink pop in fuchsia, rose pink or baby pink will do just fine to swiftly invigorate your whole look. M.A.C. Matte Lipstick- Mehr or Lakme 9 to 5 Matte Lip Color- Rosy Lips MP25 can be your perfect fitting shade.

4. The Mauve Magic- For all times you wished to have that perfect nude lip tint without making your face look rather bland; a nude mauve shade can be the key. It is a must have in your summer collection as the sheer beauty of the shade is stunning. The Bella Voste Ulti-Matte Lipstick - 09 Sweet Nector is a gorgeous number to spend some bucks on and whats for, its totally a budget find.

5. Fierce Red- The evergreen red colour never goes out of vogue, be it any season or day or time. A red is your forever safe companion; it goes with every outfit, looks great on almost every skin tone and well, a nice red is never too much. Red comes in so many different shades, it is never enough to have one, tomato red, blood red, deep red, orange red, there is a match for every girl out there. Choose from Maybelline New York Colour Sensational Creamy Matte Rich Ruby Lipstick or M.A.C. Powder Kiss Lipstick Devoted to Chili.

Now that all you stunning women out there have access to the secret wishlist to get all those flawless lip shades for each of your summer looks, go and grab your pick right away. Look glam and stay ahead of your game always.
